resources.string:
This app is for anyone who could use a pep talk when you're feeling down. 

 Stress and negative emotions can make it hard to think straight leaving them you stuck in that rut. 

 This app reminds you to take a moment to ground yourself, and helps you take an active approach to feeling better.

Swipe through pep talks, and add and edit as many as you need. 

 Create a checklist of actions or suggestions that make you feel better.

 Visit the resources page if these pep talks aren't doing it for you. There are some great techniques to help you get through this.

Of all the stress management philosophies I\'ve subscribed to, and all the tips and tricks I\'ve used to get through mood lows or bad days, I have found that the concepts of Mindfulness benefit me most. \n\n Read about how guided meditations and mindfulness exercises can help you take an active approach to feeling better right now.
Please sign in to get pep talkin\'
